## DynamicFormBuilder.bindForm() method

Constructs selectors for TForm that resolve to reactive observables. Used to bind options to form.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bindForm<TSlice extends string>(slice: ValidFormSlice<DeepRequired<TForm>, TSlice>, setter?: null, onlyOnce?: boolean): FormStateSelector<ConstructSliceFromPath<TSlice, TForm>, never, DeepPropType<TForm, TSlice, never>, string, never>;
```
